sense.def:
Aid
so denar, oprema ali usluge, ki jih dajemo ljudem v stiski.

An aid
je nekaj, kar nam olajša delo.

To aid a person or an organization
pomeni pomagati nekemu človeku ali organizaciji.

seg.quote: He crossed the border aided by a priest.

sense.def:
Dejavnost ali dogodek, ki je
in aid of a particular cause
nam pomaga zbrati denar za tisti namen.

seg.quote: ...a cricket match in aid of cancer relief.

sense.def:
To do something with the aid of a particular person or thing
pomeni, da nam določen človek ali stvar pomaga pri delu.

seg.quote: The programmes had been prepared with the aid of various broadcasters.

sense.def:
To go to the aid of someone
pomeni truditi se, da bi nekomu pomagali.

seg.quote: They had rushed to her aid.
